location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Sketch Map of Western Boundary of Dhofar

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: manuscript; coloured ink and pencil on tracing paper.Dimensions: 190 x 250mm.

mods.abstract: The map accompanies a letter on folio 67 of IOR/L/PS/12/3838, from Major Andrew Charles Stewart, the Political Agent, Muscat, to the Political Resident, Persian Gulf. Stewart states in his letter that he has enclosed a tracing taken from one of Bertram Thomas's maps, 'on which the Sultan [of Muscat] has marked what he considers to be the natural boundary of Dhofar'.The sketch map is marked with settlements, and lines showing wadis and the Dhofar boundary.
